entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:32 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:32 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
